attributes.action: allow public places to provide a smoking room
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this would give pubs and clubs the choice if they wanted to provide a smoking room for thier customers,unlike now when they can not make this choice and it would be up to a non smoker if they wish to enter these rooms

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
